title: BlackBerry Messenger (BBM) Android
description:
This Apk is a Direct Download From Play Store, Not Patched!!
Which Means You Need An Android Device Running Android 4.0 (ICS) or Above!!
But Play Store Still Says The Device Is Not Compatible on Some Devices, Even They Have 4.0 or Above, This Apk Will Work On Those Devices!!

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bbm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

Add Me If You Want To, Let Me Know That Ur A KAT/TPB User In The Invitation!!
Thanks!!
